Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Field potential duration ( FPD ) in human - induced pluripotent stem cell - derived cardiomyocytes ( hiPS - CMs ) , which can express QT interval in an electrocardiogram , is reported to be a useful tool to predict K ( + ) channel and Ca ( 2 + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| K ( + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval |
| Ca ( 2 + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval |

In this paragraph, the term "K ( + ) channel" refers to potassium channels, and "Ca ( 2 + ) channel" refers to calcium channels. The entities "K ( + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval" and "Ca ( 2 + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval" are diseases or conditions that can affect the QT interval in an electrocardiogram.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:
